00029 RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::ListBox(){
00030   this->caption="";
00031   this->setX( 0 );
00032   this->setY( 0 );
00033   drawCaption=true;
00034   this->canTakeFocus=true;
00035   selectedItem=1;
00036 }

00094 
00095 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::draw( int x, int y ){
00096   int xp= (x+this->x)-2;
00097   int yp= (y+this->y)-1;
00098 
00099   // Sets the draw color according to the focus state of the widget
00100   if (this->hasFocus)
00101     SLsmg_set_color (6);
00102   else
00103     SLsmg_set_color (0);
00104 
00105   // Draw the frame of the widget
00106   SLsmg_draw_box ( yp, xp, height, width );
00107 
00108   // Draws the caption if enabled
00109   if (drawCaption)
00110     this->drawTheCaption(xp, yp);
00111 
00112   // Draw the item list
00113   SLsmg_set_color (0);
00114   this->drawItems(xp+1, yp+1);
00115 }
00116 
00124 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::addItem(const char* c){
00125   ListBoxItem *item=new ListBoxItem(c);
00126 
00127   itemList.push_back( item );
00128 }
00129 
00136 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::drawItems(int x, int y){
00137 
00138   tListBoxItemList::const_iterator iter;
00139   int ind=1;
00140 
00141   // Iterate through list and fire the action
00142   for (iter=itemList.begin(); iter != itemList.end(); iter++)  {
00143     SLsmg_gotorc ( y, x );
00144 
00145 
00146     if ( hasFocus && ind==selectedItem ){
00147       SLsmg_set_color (1);
00148       // All the line in reverse video
00149       for (int j=1; j<width-1; j++)
00150         SLsmg_printf( " " );
00151 
00152       SLsmg_gotorc ( y, x );
00153     }
00154     else
00155       SLsmg_set_color (0);
00156 
00157     if ( (*iter)->isChecked() )
00158       SLsmg_printf( "[X] %s", (*iter)->getCaption() );
00159     else
00160       SLsmg_printf( "[ ] %s", (*iter)->getCaption() );
00161 
00162     y++;
00163     ind++;
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00174 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::setDrawCaption( bool b ){
00175   drawCaption=b;
00176 }
00177 
00182 bool RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::getDrawCaption(){
00183   return drawCaption;
00184 }
00185 
00191 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::drawTheCaption( int x, int y){
00192   SLsmg_gotorc ( y, x+2);
00193   SLsmg_set_char_set (1);
00194   SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_RTEE_CHAR );
00195   SLsmg_set_char_set (0);
00196 
00197   SLsmg_printf( " %s ", caption );
00198   SLsmg_set_char_set (1);
00199   SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_LTEE_CHAR );
00200   SLsmg_set_char_set (0);
00201 }
00202 
00207 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::receiveKeyEvent(int ch){
00208   if (ch==2) // bas
00209     keyDownHit();
00210     
00211   if (ch==1) // haut
00212     keyUpHit();
00213 
00214   if (ch==32) // space
00215     keySpaceHit();
00216 }
00217 
00222 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::keyDownHit(){
00223   selectedItem++;
00224   if (selectedItem>itemList.size())
00225     selectedItem=itemList.size();
00226 }
00227 
00232 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::keyUpHit(){
00233   selectedItem--;
00234   if (selectedItem<1)
00235     selectedItem=1;
00236 }
00237 
00242 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::keySpaceHit(){
00243   toggleItem( );
00244 }
00245 
00249 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::toggleItem( ){
00250   tListBoxItemList::const_iterator iter;
00251 
00252   int ind=1;
00253 
00254   // Iterate through list and fire the action
00255   for (iter=itemList.begin(); iter != itemList.end(); iter++){
00256     if (ind==selectedItem){
00257       (*iter)->toggle();
00258     }
00259     ind++;
00260   }
00261 }
00262 
00268 unsigned int RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBox::itemCount(){
00269   return itemList.size();
00270 }
